ALTER VIEW view_label_data_process_order AS SELECT PO.PROCESS_ORDER, PO.STATUS, PO.MATERIAL, PO.REQUIRED_UOM, PO.REQUIRED_RESOURCE, PO.DUE_DATE, MAT.MATERIAL_TYPE, MAT.DESCRIPTION, right(concat('00000000000000', `MATUOM_PROD`.`EAN`),14) AS `PROD_EAN`, right(concat('00', `MATUOM_PROD`.`VARIANT`),2) AS `PROD_VARIANT`, MATUOM_BASE.NUMERATOR AS PROD_QUANTITY, right(concat('00000000000000', `MATUOM_BASE`.`EAN`),14) AS `BASE_EAN`, right(concat('00', `MATUOM_BASE`.`VARIANT`),2) AS `BASE_VARIANT`, MATUOM_PROD.NUMERATOR AS BASE_QUANTITY, c4j_GetFullPalletQuantity(PO.PROCESS_ORDER) AS PALLET_QUANTITY, c4j_GetLayers(PO.PROCESS_ORDER) AS PALLET_LAYERS, MAT.OLD_MATERIAL, MAT.SHELF_LIFE, MAT.SHELF_LIFE_UOM, MAT.SHELF_LIFE_RULE, PO.CUSTOMER_ID, CUST.CUSTOMER_NAME, c4j_GetFinalBatchNumber(curdate(), 'N', '', '', PO.PROCESS_ORDER) AS BATCH_NUMBER, c4j_GetFinalExpiryDate(curdate(), MAT.SHELF_LIFE, MAT.SHELF_LIFE_UOM, MAT.SHELF_LIFE_RULE, 'N', curdate()) AS EXPIRY_DATE, MAT.UPDATED AS MATERIAL_UPDATED, PO.UPDATED AS PROCESS_ORDER_UPDATED FROM ((((`APP_PROCESS_ORDER` `PO` JOIN `APP_MATERIAL` `MAT`) JOIN `APP_CUSTOMER` `CUST`) JOIN `APP_MATERIAL_UOM` `MATUOM_PROD`) JOIN `APP_MATERIAL_UOM` `MATUOM_BASE`) WHERE ((`MAT`.`MATERIAL` = `PO`.`MATERIAL`) AND (`CUST`.`CUSTOMER_ID` = `PO`.`CUSTOMER_ID`) AND (`MATUOM_PROD`.`MATERIAL` = `PO`.`MATERIAL`) AND (`MATUOM_PROD`.`UOM` = `PO`.`REQUIRED_UOM`) AND (`MATUOM_BASE`.`MATERIAL` = `PO`.`MATERIAL`) AND (`MATUOM_BASE`.`UOM` = `MAT`.`BASE_UOM`) )
